alert.note: Alert for Harris; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 4:11AM EDT until March 26 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Troup County in west central Georgia... Northwestern Harris County in west central Georgia... * Until 515 AM EDT. * At 411 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Chambers, or near Lafayette, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Southern Harbor, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, State Line Park, Rocky Point, Piedmont Heights, Big Springs, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad and Long Cane. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
